```{r setup}
library(htmlwidgets)
library(htmltools)
library(dplyr)
library(leaflethex)
library(stats)
```

```{r}
df <- tibble(
  lat = stats::rnorm(100),
  lng = stats::rnorm(100),
  size = runif(100, 5, 20),
  color = sample(colors(), 100)
)
leaflet::leaflet(df) %>% 
  leaflet::addTiles() %>% 
  add_hexbin()
```
